languages.text: {n}Под бесстрастной маской мужчины мелькает что-то — ярость? Горечь? Впрочем, голос дознавателя остается бесстрастным.{/n} "В таком случае считаю необходимым указать, что вместе со спасенными на корабль может проникнуть и печать Архиврага. Учитывайте это на будущее".

{n}You detect a flicker of something beneath Heinrix's sanguine mask. Anger? Bitterness? Whatever it may be, it does not seep into the Interrogator's dispassionate voice.{/n} "In that case, I consider it necessary to point out that the mark of the Archenemy could infiltrate the ship along with any rescued people. Keep that in mind for the future."
languages.original_text: {n}Под бесстрастной маской мужчины мелькает что-то — ярость? Горечь? Впрочем, голос дознавателя остается бесстрастным.{/n} "В таком случае считаю необходимым указать, что вместе со спасенными на корабль может проникнуть и печать Архиврага. Учитывайте это на будущее".

Whatever it may be, it does not seep into the Interrogator's dispassionate voice.{/n} "In that case, I consider it necessary to point out that the mark of the Archenemy could infiltrate the ship along with any rescued people. Keep that in mind for the future."

languages.text: {n}你感觉到，海因里希那张冰冷的面孔之下似乎有什么东西在闪烁着。是愤怒吗？是怨恨吗？无论是什么，它都并没有影响到这位审讯官冷静的声音。{/n}“如果是这样的话，我认为我有必要提醒你：那些获救的人可能会带着混沌大敌的印记，渗透到这艘船上。今后请务必牢记这点。”
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a flicker of something beneath Heinrix's sanguine mask. Anger? Bitterness? Whatever it may be, it does not seep into the Interrogator's dispassionate voice.{/n} "In that case, I consider it necessary to point out that the mark of the Archenemy could infiltrate the ship along with any rescued people. Keep that in mind for the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}你感觉到，海因里希那张血红色的面具之下似乎有什么东西在闪烁着。是愤怒吗？是怨恨吗？无论是什么，它都并没有影响到这位审讯官冷静的声音。{/n}“如果是这样的话，我认为我有必要提醒你：那些获救的人可能会带着混沌大敌的印记，渗透到这艘船上。今后请务必牢记这点。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの自信に満ちた表情の下に、何かが揺らいでいるのを察知する。それは怒りの感情か？苦しみか？それが何であろうと、インテロゲイターの冷静な声にそれが滲み出すことはない。{/n}「それならば、渾沌の勢力の印が、救出された人々とともに船に潜り込む可能性があります。今後のために覚えておいてください」
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a flicker of something beneath Heinrix's sanguine mask. Anger? Bitterness? Whatever it may be, it does not seep into the Interrogator's dispassionate voice.{/n} "In that case, I consider it necessary to point out that the mark of the Archenemy could infiltrate the ship along with any rescued people. Keep that in mind for the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの自身に満ちた表情の下に、何かが揺らいでいるのを察知した。それは怒りの感情か？苦しみか？それが何であろうと、インテロゲイターの冷静な声にそれが滲み出すことはない。{/n}「それならば、渾沌の勢力の印が、救出された人々とともに船に潜り込む可能性がある。今後のために覚えておいてもらおう」
{n}ハインリックスの自信に満ちた表情の下に、何かが揺らいでいるのを察知する。それは怒りの感情か？苦しみか？それが何であろうと、インテロゲイターの冷静な声にそれが滲み出すことはない。{/n}「それならば、渾沌の勢力の印が、救出された人々とともに船に潜り込む可能性があります。今後のために覚えておいてください」

languages.text: {n}Irgendetwas flackert unter Heinrix' optimistischer Maske. Wut? Verbitterung? Was es auch sein mag, es findet keinen Einzug in die leidenschaftslose Stimme des Interrogators.{/n} "In dem Fall halte ich es für erforderlich, zu erwähnen, dass mit jedem Geretteten das Mal des Erzfeinds das Schiff infiltrieren könnte. Behaltet das hinkünftig im Kopf."
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a flicker of something beneath Heinrix's sanguine mask. Anger? Bitterness? Whatever it may be, it does not seep into the Interrogator's dispassionate voice.{/n} "In that case, I consider it necessary to point out that the mark of the Archenemy could infiltrate the ship along with any rescued people. Keep that in mind for the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}Irgendetwas flackert unter Heinrix' optimistischer Maske. Wut? Verbitterung? Was es auch sein mag, es findet keinen Einzug in die leidenschaftslose Stimme des Interrogators.{/n} "In dem Fall halte ich es für erforderlich, zu erwähnen, dass mit jedem Geretteten das Mal des Erzfeinds das Schiff infiltrieren könnte. Behaltet das hinkünftig im Kopf."

languages.text: {n}Vous détectez la trace d'une émotion sous le masque sanguin d'Heinrix. De la colère ? De l'amertume ? Quoi que cela puisse être, il n'en transparaît rien dans la voix dénuée de toute émotion de l'interrogateur.{/n} « En ce cas, permettez-moi tout de même de préciser que la marque du Grand Ennemi pourrait s'infiltrer dans le vaisseau avec les rescapés. Tâchez de ne pas l'oublier. »
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a flicker of something beneath Heinrix's sanguine mask. Anger? Bitterness? Whatever it may be, it does not seep into the Interrogator's dispassionate voice.{/n} "In that case, I consider it necessary to point out that the mark of the Archenemy could infiltrate the ship along with any rescued people. Keep that in mind for the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous détectez la trace d'une émotion sous le masque sanguin d'Heinrix. De la colère ? De l'amertume ? Quoi que cela puisse être, il n'en transparaît rien dans la voix dénuée de toute émotion de l'interrogateur.{/n} « En ce cas, permettez-moi tout de même de préciser que la marque du Grand Ennemi pourrait s'infiltrer dans le vaisseau avec les rescapés. Tâchez de ne pas l'oublier. »

languages.text: {n}Percibes un rastro de algo bajo la máscara optimista de Heinrix. ¿Ira? ¿Rencor? Sea lo que sea, no se muestra en la voz imparcial del interrogador.{/n} «En ese caso, considero necesario señalar que la marca del Archienemigo podría infiltrarse en esta nave junto con los rescatados. Recuérdalo para el futuro».
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a flicker of something beneath Heinrix's sanguine mask. Anger? Bitterness? Whatever it may be, it does not seep into the Interrogator's dispassionate voice.{/n} "In that case, I consider it necessary to point out that the mark of the Archenemy could infiltrate the ship along with any rescued people. Keep that in mind for the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}Percibes un rastro de algo bajo la máscara optimista de Heinrix. ¿Ira? ¿Rencor? Sea lo que sea, no se muestra en la voz imparcial del interrogador.{/n} «En ese caso, considero necesario señalar que la marca del Archienemigo podría infiltrarse en esta nave junto con los rescatados. Recuérdalo para el futuro».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in ifadesiz maskesinin altında bir titreşim fark ediyorsun. Öfke mi? Acı mı? Her ne ise Sorgucu'nun duygudan yoksun sesine yansımıyor.{/n} "Bu durumda Şerbaşı'nın damgasının, kurtarılan herhangi bir kimse ile gemiye sızabileceğini belirtmenin yerinde olduğunu düşünüyorum. Aklınızın bir köşesinde dursun."
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a flicker of something beneath Heinrix's sanguine mask. Anger? Bitterness? Whatever it may be, it does not seep into the Interrogator's dispassionate voice.{/n} "In that case, I consider it necessary to point out that the mark of the Archenemy could infiltrate the ship along with any rescued people. Keep that in mind for the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in kendinden emin maskesinin altında bir ürperti fark ediyorsun. Öfke mi? Hoşnutsuzluk mu? Her ne ise Sorgucu'nun duygusuz sesine yansımıyor.{/n} "Bu durumda Şerbaşı'nın izinin, kurtarılan herhangi bir kimse ile gemiye sızabileceğini belirtmenin yerinde olduğunu düşünüyorum. Gelecekte aklımızda bulunsun."
